name: Pippin' HOT Delivery
description:
Description:

It's summer in the North Pole, and the pizzas aren't gonna deliver themselves! Step in the shoes of this summer job champ and deliver a jalapeño pizza so hot it turns the poles into a desert!

Controls:

Use LEFT/RIGHT to move around.

Press UP to jump.

Press DOWN to put down/pick up your pizza box.

Use A to kick.

Use S to open/close your pizza box. Locked during first levels.

Use D to interact with levers.

If your pizza gets wet, the level is reset.

IMPORTANT: Press R if you get stuck to reset the level.

Credits:

Game made for Jackpot Jam. All assets including sounds, music and code made by me from scratch since the start of the jam.

Art by me using Nauris NA16 Palette.
